entry.def: A thimble is a small metal or plastic object which you use to protect your finger when you are sewing.

means.word_mean: 1. as much as a thimble will hold
2. a small metal cap to protect the finger while sewing; can be used as a small container

auth_sentence.content: He is washing down sushi with a thimble of sake.
